attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Lemon Tree as a charitable arts organisation provided the North East of Scotland a unique opportunity for not only the music gigs for which it is widely known; but quality theatre productions, children's theatre and shows, socially inclusive development work in The Lemon Tree and outreach projects working with young people in the communities of Aberdeen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
